about_the_game:
Bandeirantes invites the player to experience the life of one of the bandeirantes who explored Brazil in the 17th century.

The game takes place in the year 1650 and the player's objective is to organize and lead a Bandeira within the state of São Paulo and parts of Minas Gerais, Goiás, Mato Grosso do Sul and Paraná.

Buy carts, animals, food, water, tools, weapons and hire bandeirantes in 10 different classes to fulfill your objective: Expand the map of Brazil and find riches such as Gold, Silver, Precious Stones and other minerals.
Enemies include terrain, disease, animals, hostile indigenous people, and Spaniards who do not respect the Treaty of Tordesihas.

Game Mechanics includes Plantation, Work, Negotiation with Indigenous People, Hunting, Fishing, Village Construction, Karma for your Decisions, among others.

Come be a modern Girl Scout and show how you would do to be the best among them all.

content_descriptors.notes: The player will need to defend himself from wild animals and bandits.
